title: Wow!!! Amazing Studio Includes Washer & Dryer!
posting_body: Caliza Lakeline would like to invite you to come visit our beautiful property located in North Austin next Lakeline Mall and close to Lake Travis.
We have a beautiful studio apartment home available for immediate move-in.
The A1 floorplan is 621 SF and features an beautiful open kitchen with granite countertops, vinyl wood planking floors, breakfast bar, as well as in-unit washer and dryer.
Caliza also has a beautiful swimming pool with a fire pit for our Texas summer nights, 2 gas grills and a expansive fitness center you will absolutely love!
Stop by for tour Caliza Lakeline today!
Please feel free to visit us online <URL>!
